data.text: @KippinDC Dear Mr Kippin, we would like to inform you that for this leg, Firenze Frankfurt, you have to contact directly the Lufthansa colleagues as they were in charge for this leg. BR/Laure
@KippinDC Dear Kippin, we are really sorry to read that. In order to check could you kindly send us via DM the flight number? BR/Laure
@AgueraMartin Thank you very much Mr Agüera 😊✈️

There are moments when you realise you’ve achieved your dream.

The return of our JO with its new livery is definitely one of those moments. 
A day on which we were delighted by Chef #AlbertoFaccani , owner of the Magnolia Ristorante, which has ⭐️⭐️ #MichelinStars.

#AirDolomiti https://t.co/HPMe0Lxmoy

It's classified. I could tell you, but then I'd have to kill you. This is just one of the many #quotes that made #TopGun a cult film in the '80s and a source of #inspo for generations of #pilots! Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/OSEgC2uMBa #FlyingAcademy #careers ✈️ https://t.co/gB3WzNxTEW

data.text: @petteriko @lufthansa Dear Mr Petteri, first of all we wish you a happy new year. We are terribly sorry and totally understand your point. I have just sent a reminder to my colleagues of the Customer Relations Dpt. We thank you for your ongoing patience and will get back to you asap. BR/Laure

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
On January 1st and 6th, our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed. We will be at your complete disposal from 2nd to 5th January from 8.30 am to 8 pm!

Ever thought that going upwind might sometimes be the easiest solution? Take a look at what our pilots have to say about #landing on the #AirDolomitiBlog ✈️ https://t.co/R8quJHYBjP https://t.co/pWwKnhNeMn

With a pilot's licence and an apprenticeship as a nurse, #EllenChurch opened up to women the doors of a profession that until 1930 was reserved for men: being a #flightattendant! Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/oJwqImdhF2 https://t.co/fsRS42oVvK
@MariahDolenc Thank you for flying with us and for sharing this cute pic! 😍We look forward to welcoming you and your precious girls on board soon again!

data.text: @bevehl @Lufthansa_DE @DB_Bahn @SAS @eurowings @MUC_Airport Thank you for flying with us, we look forward to welcoming you on board soon again! We wish you happy holidays and all the best for a successful 2019!
@bevehl Thank you for flying with us! Hope to welcome you on board soon again! Happy holidays!

@marctbblue Hi Marc, thank you so much for your kind words! We truly appreciate our passengers' feedbacks and we'll surely pass it on to our colleagues! We're glad you enjoyed flying with us and can't wait to welcome you on board soon again. Happy holidays to you and your beloved ones!
@PazzaNathy3 Same to you and your family, Nathalie! 🤗
@Colcestrian Happy holidays to you and your beloved ones! 🎄🍾🥳

@GrootGeneraal Hi George, sorry for the late reply but our page is staffed Mon-Fri 9am-5pm. Could you please submit your claim here: https://t.co/wd2eGSow1y? Our colleagues will take care of your request and get back to you asap. BR/Michaela

data.text:
*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
On December 25th and 26th our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed.We will be at your complete disposal from 27 to Dec 31st and from the 2nd to the 5th Jan.
 We wish you a Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!

Passion and dedication have always set #AirDolomiti and @MrAmaroneMasi apart.
The two companies from Veneto,who have partnered together for the "Winery of the Year" project,have both been supporting our country's talent for many years now.
Because all our dreams can come true. https://t.co/8T6HedSRTK

data.text: Clint Eastwood, Harrison Ford, Tom Cruise, Dennis Quaid and Hilary Swank are just a few celebrities with a passion for high altitude. ✈️Find out about others on the #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/Tq3jKHbxL1
@LisaJacksonSYL Thanks for letting us know that our Customer Relation Department finally got back to you via email and helped with your request. Thanks once more for contacting us. BR/Michaela

Travel back in time thanks to the Lenbachhaus museum. The #Intellectual invites you to discover the works of the artists who spent time in #Munich at the beginning of the 20th century and started the Blaue Reiter movement. #AlternativeGuide https://t.co/KGeyqfkEnS

data.text:
🎄It's almost time to fly and see you family for Christmas, but how do you avoid taking a load of presents with you? With a little bit of cunning and the tips on the #AirDolomitiBlog.  
https://t.co/NRnaQ3xHDC https://t.co/aXNYtO1vZj

At Barberhouse, beards and moustaches reign supreme, but you'll also spy #Munich locals finding inspiration in select magazines and relaxing as they sip aperitifs in the lounge. https://t.co/09BYY1LqZz 
#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/Rt7f8Wv5Dw
@GarethJBond @bevoc For sure we will 😉😊 and concerning the direct flights, we will forward your request to the dpt in charge! ✈️

@LisaJacksonSYL Dear Lisa, we truly apologize for the inconvenience and totally understand your point. Would you be so kind to send us flight details and day via DM? We will asap check your status request. BR/Laure

Do you need a break for yourself and some fun for the little ones? In Poing wildlife park you'll find plenty to do and lots of new four-legged friends to meet and feed. Ask how at the entrance ;) https://t.co/a2fSLIEfI9 
#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/574QnpDIL2

data.text:
From Dior to Emilio Pucci, through Balenciaga, many designers have created flight attendant uniforms in line with the latest fashion trends and in-flight needs. If you had to choose one to wear for a day, which would you choose? 
👉 https://t.co/On4AoFSqlN 👈
#AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/P74GxCU4AG

Experience your own #AlternativeGuide in real life and explore #Munich from a fresh perspective. Meet the locals and discover the places to be and the secrets of its historic quarters.

Enjoy the full version of the video under https://t.co/mJldMOSG8j

What if an engine cuts out? What if radio frequency is interrupted? Some of the typical concerns of people with a fear of flying, but here's a word to help you travel carefree: #redundancy. Find more on our #AirDolomitiBlog! #avgeek https://t.co/XVaah8FOIq https://t.co/e5cyu5i8CE

data.text: @Sueladner @lufthansa Good morning dear Sue, we truly apologize and understand your point. Unfortunately our Customer Relations dpt is facing a high incoming volume of requests. In order to forward your message, could you kindly send us the flight details and the day?Looking forward to hearing from u

A partire dal 2019 sarà attiva l'#AccademiadiVolo firmata #AirDolomiti grazie alla quale nasceranno nuovi piloti. La compagnia sta investendo per ricercare ragazzi che desiderano intraprendere la carriera da #FirstOfficer. Qui tutti i dettagli: https://t.co/TdhkhS4E47 https://t.co/gZYCSrY80M

data.text:
@tu_amorkata @lufthansa Dear MRS Hunt, 
we would like to truly apologize for all the inconvenience,we totally understand your point. As it is in our intention to help you further, we need more details.Will you send us via DM, as sensitive data, flight number, day and an email address? BR/Laure

Here we go again 🙌

😉👩‍🍳 Wanna take part in our #cookingshows with our partner @EatalyIT ?

Pop by at @ttgitalia in #Rimini. 
October the 10th til the 12th

See you there! 
#AirDolomiti https://t.co/lb9tPdcsma

data.text: @gaveltri Gentile Giuseppe, dopo una verifica interna le suggeriamo di recarsi in ogni modo al gate. Qualora il gate fosse già chiuso le consigliamo di recarsi al Lufthansa Service Center, che provvederà ad eventuale riprotezione.
@gaveltri Buon pomeriggio gentile Giuseppe, scusandoci per il ritardo ti chiediamo gentilmente di inviarci i dettagli di volo per maggiore assistenza /Laure
